title: Looking to coach Silver/Bronze players
body:
Hey, I'm a plat Support main. Play like Thresh, nami, Soraka, Blitz etc. I can probably coach other lanes too, but support is my specialty. 
Taking a break off league. sometimes just need a break to play other things. That being said, I'm pretty knowledgable about the game and I've been told that I'm really good at teaching/tutoring. Enjoy it too. I thought it could be fun to coach during my off-season.

I'd like to think I could teach gold players a lot too.

I'm on OCE, Username XPITCHPLEASEX
https://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=XPitchPleaseX

If you're not on OCE let me know your discord and ill try to add you. :)

replies.body: I also sent you a friend request and would like to learn from you aswell :) I am an adc main currently stuck at silver 3 :)
Im at silver 2 main adc. maybe I can learn from you. sent u a request.
